name: Obversion
detailed_description: Explore a vibrant universe of cubes.  Solve puzzles by manipulating your environment.  Advance through distinct worlds as you master the connections between positive and negative, creation and destruction, dead and alive.  And if you make a mistake, don’t worry, you can undo all the way back to the beginning.

short_description: Obversion is an abstract puzzle platformer set in a vibrant universe of cubes.
